Marah Gubernur Sugianto Sabran, Kecewa Sistem Perwasitan
03 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Herianto Batubara
Jakarta - Gubernur Kalimantan Tengah Sugianto Sabran marah saat menonton laga Kalteng Putra versus Persib Bandung yang berakhir 0-2. Dia mengaku kecewa karena pertandingan tersebut menurutnya tidak berjalan dengan fair. Kekecewaan dia lampiaskan dengan aksi lempar botol yang kemudian viral dan jadi sorotan.
Pertandingan Kalteng Putra versus Persib Bandung itu digelar di Stadion Tuah Pahoe, Palangka Raya, Jumat (1/11) malam. Laga berlangsung panas. Dari tribun VVIP, Sugianto yang mengenakan kaos warna oranye dan topi warna hitam tampak marah. Dia tampak menunjuk-nunjuk ke arah lapangan.
Sejurus kemudian, Sugianto tampak menggenggam botol air mineral. Botol itu kemudian dia lemparkan. Video aksinya itu tersebar di media sosial dan viral. Video lainnya, saat dirinya turun dari tribun VVIP dan marah-marah ke polisi juga viral. Belakangan diketahui orang yang dia marahi itu adalah Kapolres Palangka Raya AKBP Timbul RK Siregar.
Dihubungi detikcom, AKBP Timbul Siregar membenarkan adanya peristiwa itu. Dia menyebut peristiwa itu terjadi karena Sugianto tidak terima ditegur olehnya.
"Mungkin pas Gubernur emosional sama wasit tiba-tiba dia ngelempar botol ke lapangan. Begitu dia lempar botol ke lapangan, akhirnya para penonton ngelemparin botol. Ngelihat situasi itu, Gubernur masih melempar, saya tegur untuk tidak lakukan pelemparan," ucapnya.


Foto: Gubernur Kalteng Sugianto Sabran di stadion usai pertandingan (Asep/Diskominfo)

"Melihat situasi itu, ya Gubernur masih melempar, saya tegur untuk tidak lakukan pelemparan. Mungkin nggak berkenan, dia negur. Dia turun dari tribun utama," sambungnya.
AKBP Timbul mengaku sudah menjelaskan alasannya menegur Sugianto. Timbul tak ingin aksi pelemparan botol Sugianto tersebut diikuti oleh para suporter.
"Cuma mau bilang, kenapa negur dia, gitu.... Saya bilang, 'Oh, Bapak melakukan tindakan, Bapak melempar ini, akhirnya seluruh penonton, hampir beberapa penonton ikut ngelemparin.' Jadi akhirnya hampir ramai," ujar dia.

Angry Governor Sugianto Sabran, Disappointed with the Supervision System
03 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Herianto Batubara
Jakarta - Central Kalimantan Governor Sugianto Sabran was angry while watching the Kalteng Putra versus Persib Bandung match which ended 0-2. He admitted that he was disappointed because the match, according to him, did not run fairly. His disappointment was relieved by the action of throwing a bottle which then went viral and became the spotlight.
The Kalteng Putra versus Persib Bandung match was held at Tuah Pahoe Stadium, Palangka Raya, Friday (1/11) night. The match took place hot. From the VVIP stands, Sugianto, who wore an orange shirt and a black hat, looked angry. He seemed to be pointing towards the field.
A moment later, Sugianto was seen holding a mineral water bottle. He then threw the bottle. The video of the action was spread on social media and viral. Another video, when he came down from the stands of VVIP and angry at the police also viral. Later it became known that the person he was angry with was the Chief of the Palangkaraya Police AKBP Timbul RK Siregar.
When contacted by AFP, AKBP Timbul Siregar confirmed the incident. He said the incident happened because Sugianto did not receive reprimand by him.
"Maybe when the Governor was emotional and the referee suddenly threw the bottle into the field. As soon as he threw the bottle into the field, the audience finally threw the bottle.


Photo: Central Kalimantan Governor Sugianto Sabran at the stadium after the match (Asep / Diskominfo)

"Seeing the situation, the Governor is still throwing in, I admonished him not to throw. Maybe it was not acceptable, he was neglected. He came down from the main stand," he continued.
AKBP Timbul claimed to have explained the reason for reprimanding Sugianto. Timbul did not want the action of throwing the Sugianto bottle to be followed by supporters.
"Just wanted to say, why did he negate, like that ... I said, 'Oh, you did the action, you threw this, finally the whole audience, almost a number of the audience threw it off.' So finally it was almost crowded, "he said.
